answers.answer: If it were my mother I'd make sure to get blood work done and look for the potassium level in her blood.  Some medications can cause the problem, namely diuretics.  I get cramps when my sodium and potassium levels get too low.  Burning sensations in the legs and feet are strong indicators for diabetes.I wouldn't add any supplements until a doctor checks her blood work.
